Scenario1-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-1: GIVEN Valid PaymentMethodId,EnrolleeId, PersonId & ClientKey WHEN requesting to DELETE PaymentMethodId THEN should able to PaymentMethodId

Scenario2-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-1: GIVEN Invalid PaymentMethodId WHEN requesting to DELETE PaymentMethodId THEN should get Bad Request.
Scenario2-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCodes and Accounts Details in the response.

Scenario3-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-1: GIVEN Empty EnrolleeId WHEN requesting to DELETE PaymentMethodId THEN should get Not Found.
Scenario3-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCodes and Accounts Details in the response.

Scenario4-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-1: GIVEN Invalid ClientKey WHEN requesting to DELETE PaymentMethodId THEN should get Unauthorized Error.
Scenario4-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCodes and Accounts Details in the response.

Scenario5-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-1: GIVEN Empty ClientKey WHEN requesting to DELETE PaymentMethodId THEN should get Bad Request.
Scenario5-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCodes and Accounts Details in the response.

Scenario6-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-1: GIVEN Empty PersonId WHEN requesting to DELETE PaymentMethodId THEN should get Bad Request.
Scenario6-Accounts&Billing-Delete Paymen.TC-2: Validation of ErrorCodes and Accounts Details in the response.
